name: Women's Campside Oxfords
description: This ultracomfortable lace-to-toe Oxford boasts a super-soft canvas, thick cushioning, and quality construction for a broken-in feel from the first time you put them on. Size & Fit: Order regular shoe size. For half sizes not offered, order up to next whole size. Specs: Approx. weight: 1 lb.1 oz. per pair. Construction: Soft canvas material for a broken-in feel and look. Comfortable EVA innersole with Cleansport NXT® antimicrobial odor control. Vintage hunt, fish and camping motif on innersole. Moderate arch contour of innersole. EVA foam midsole for cushioning and support. Chain-tread-inspired molded rubber outsole with modified chain-tread pattern. Imported. Questions? Please contact us for any inquiries.

name: Recycled Waterhog Dog Mat, Chevron Weave
description: Protect your floors from spills and splashing with our absorbent and quick-drying Recycled Waterhog dog mats. Size & Fit: Small: 18"L x 28"W. Medium: 22.5"L x 34.5"W. Large: 26.5"L x 41"W. Specs: Recycled Waterhog fabric is made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles. Absorbent and quick-drying. PVC-free. Skid-resistant backing. Construction: Thick border traps water and dirt. Antimicrobial treatment stops mold, mildew and bacteria growth. Fabric is solution dyed – resists fading from sunlight. Machine wash and dry. Made in USA. Questions? Please contact us for any inquiries.

name: Infant and Toddler Girls' Coastal Chill Swimsuit, Two-Piece
description: She'll love the bright colors, ruffles and exciting patterns of this warm-weather essential. Size & Fit: One-piece suits run small. If your child is at the top of the size range, please size up. Specs: UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Construction: Two-piece includes a top and bottom. Top has ruffles, with cross-back straps for a comfortable stay-put fit. Bottom has ruffles around waistband, with full coverage. Imported. Questions? Please contact us for any inquiries.

name: Refresh Swimwear, V-Neck Tankini Contrasts
description: Whether you're going for a swim or heading out for a day on the boat, you'll love this soft and stretchy tankini for its comfort and style. Size & Fit: Order your regular size. Especially flattering on curvy figures. Just right for a D-cup. Falls at high hip. Specs: UPF 50+ rated – the highest rated sun protection possible. Fully front lined. Construction: Soft, easy-care 78% nylon/22% spandex matte microfiber, brushed for a lustrous feel. Bow detail at empire waist. Removable soft cups. Crossback straps. Imported. Questions? Please contact us for any inquiries.

name: EcoFlex 3L Storm Pants
description: Our new TEK O2 technology makes our four-season pants more breathable than ever, and their lightweight waterproof protection means you're covered come rain, snow or all-day mist. Size & Fit: Comfort Waist provides up to 2 in. of additional comfort. Relaxed Fit: Designed with a regular rise that sits at the waist. Inseam: Regular 31 in., Petite 29 in. Leg opening: 18 in. Specs: Weight: 15 oz. Waterproof Rating: 20,000 mm. Breathability Rating: 20,000 g/m2. Fabric: 100% nylon, exclusive of trim. Hollow-core polyester insulation. Waterproof rating: 20,000mm. Seam sealed: Fully taped seams for 100% waterproof protection. HyperDry DWR treatment for superior, durable water repellency. Construction: Attached webbing belt, d-ring on belt for attaching gear. Two zippered hand pockets. Velcro closure at back pocket. Full-length side zips with interior storm flap. Hook and loop leg cuff adjustment. Hook with bungee for securing pants to boots. Articulated knees for enhanced mobility. Reinforced scuff guard. Imported. Questions? Please contact us for any inquiries.
